name: Acererak the Archlich
triggered_abilities: if you haven't completed tomb of annihilation, return cardname to its owner's hand and venture into the dungeon.
for each opponent, you create a 2/2 black zombie creature token unless that player sacrifices a creature.

name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
triggered_abilities: proliferate. (choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Aetherworks Marvel
triggered_abilities: a permanent you control is put into a graveyard

activated_abilities.effect: look at the top six cards of your library. you may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Lair of the Hydra

activated_abilities.effect: until end of turn, cardname becomes an x/x green hydra creature. it's still a land. x can't be 0.

static_abilities: if you control two or more other lands, cardname enters the battlefield tapped.

activated_abilities.effect: if there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.

name: Chandra, Awakened Inferno
loyalty_abilities: +2: each opponent gets an emblem with "at the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 1 damage to you."
−3: cardname deals 3 damage to each non-elemental creature.
−x: cardname deals x damage to target creature or planeswalker. if a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Teferi, Hero of Dominaria
loyalty_abilities: +1: draw a card. at the beginning of the next end step, untap up to two lands.
−3: put target nonland permanent into its owner's library third from the top.
−8: you get an emblem with "whenever you draw a card, exile target permanent an opponent controls."

modes: return target permanent to its owner's hand.
target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Sphinx of the Second Sun
triggered_abilities: there is an additional beginning phase after this phase. (the beginning phase includes the untap, upkeep, and draw steps.)

name: Gift of Immortality
triggered_abilities: return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. return cardname to the battlefield attached to that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Mythos of Nethroi
static_abilities: destroy target nonland permanent if it's a creature or if {g}{w} was spent to cast this spell.

name: Terminus
keywords: miracle {w} (you may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
static_abilities: put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.

name: Soulherder
triggered_abilities: a creature is exiled from the battlefield
you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Pact of Negation
triggered_abilities: pay {3}{u}{u}. if you don't, you lose the game.

name: Soulfire Grand Master

activated_abilities.effect: the next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, put that card into your hand instead of into your graveyard as it resolves.

static_abilities: instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.

name: Soulfire Eruption
static_abilities: choose any number of target creatures, planeswalkers, and/or players. for each of them, exile the top card of your library, then cardname deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that permanent or player. you may play the exiled cards until the end of your next turn.

name: Tragic Arrogance
static_abilities: for each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.

name: Preordain
static_abilities: scry 2, then draw a card. (to scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Wishclaw Talisman

activated_abilities.cost: {1}, {t}, remove a wish counter from cardname
activated_abilities.effect: search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. an opponent gains control of cardname. activate only during your turn.

static_abilities: cardname enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.

name: Wheel of Fortune
static_abilities: each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
